title: Step 1 ‚Äì Project Overview
content:
Welcome to the **Next.js 14 + TypeScript To-Do App Workshop**!

In this hands-on activity, you will progressively build a complete **To-Do List Application** using the App Router. Each step introduces a new concept: project setup, components, state, styling, and deployment. This is the essence of *Learning by Doing*.

title: Step 4 ‚Äì Understand the Structure
content: You should now see this structure:
code:
app/
  layout.tsx
  page.tsx
  globals.css
components/

explain: The **app/** folder contains your routes and layouts. The **components/** folder will contain reusable UI parts.

title: Step 6 ‚Äì Install Animation and Icon Libraries
content: To make your To-Do List visually stunning and interactive, let‚Äôs install **Framer Motion** (for animations) and **Lucide React** (for icons).
explain: Framer Motion provides smooth animations for React components, while Lucide React offers modern, minimalist SVG icons perfect for your UI.

title: Step 7 ‚Äì Build the Professional To-Do List UI
content: Now that dependencies are installed, let‚Äôs upgrade your To-Do List with animations, icons, and persistent data using **localStorage**.
